reviewText: Going to use this as a health lesson for home school.  I haven't watched either movie yet but I'm sure the point will get across.
Both DVD's are worth watching when you need evidence for toxic food.
Excellent video on sugar and the effects on each of us, I could totally relate. Must see

I saw this on demand for free and afterwards immediately purchased the DVD. I have been forcing anyone I care about to watch it. It presents a very big problem in a entertaining and simple to understand format. Parents of young children should especially watch the sugar movie. Being aware of what the industry is doing to our children's food is paramount for their future well being. It will force you to make more conscious and carful decisions about what foods you purchase.

Get this. It changed my life.
I have watched it dozens of times. Don't be put of by the casual demeanor of these movies - they are highly accessible and not at all snobby. Gosh, I hate food snobs.
These are serious in their intent, with just a touch of humor thrown in.
I am a Vegan and learned much, here.
Highly recommended for your permanent library. An excellent investment.
I think everyone needs to buy these DVD's
Very good films,had my kids watch them!!
A must see for all Americans!
Must see for anyone concerned about their health, weight and overall vitality.
A bit of a mixup in the shipping (my bad - Amazon fixed it. )  No problems otherwise.  Could have been a great experience.  The product came in great shape. So I give a five stars rating anyway :)
Very informative.
I got this for a nutrition unit. I thought the supersize movie would be the best but the sugar movie was really amazing!
That Sugar Movie was amazing!  It changed my life.  Since I stopped eating foods with hidden sugar, I've lost 5 pounds and my belly is flat again.
Both documentaries were good
Best video you will every buy to save your health!!  Highly recommend it!!
Very well done
That Sugar Film was fine, but my Super Size Me DVD would only play to about 2/3s of the DVD. I was disappointed with this DVD.

dvd is scratched - freezes on first use
not worth the money

Enjoyed the Sugar  Movie very much.  The Super Size Me was a little over the top...not impressed with the guy, but it was informative, but no more than I expected from anyone who eats fast food every day.
That Sugar Film should be seen by everyone! Liked that this was a duo disc purchase.
It came scratched and with a funky film on it that made it skip several times. I couldn't watch the film and had to figure something else out for my work meeting.
This is exactly what my undergrad students must see.
The Supersize Me video was defective and doesn't play on any device.
Great information!!
